posts.author: David Fisher

posts.content: Calling FST
posts.author: Roger Hicks

posts.content: MOD Jason Wolfe reports no devices malfunctioning or offline.
posts.author: Roger Hicks

posts.content: Tech has located 2 switches, Fortigate, and FEXT. Having tech look for APs.
posts.author: Roger Hicks

posts.content: APs are mounted. FST is waiting on MOD to complete end of day so he can begin cutover.
posts.author: Roger Hicks

posts.content: FST is waiting on MOD to complete end of day so he can begin cutover.
posts.author: Roger Hicks

posts.content: Tech is beginning cutover.
posts.author: Roger Hicks

posts.content: Tech is working on cutover
posts.author: Roger Hicks

posts.content: Tech has removed legacy devices and installed new devices. Working on mounting FEXT.
posts.author: Roger Hicks

posts.content: Tech is working on cutover.
posts.author: Roger Hicks

posts.content:
Tech reports many cables are missing color clips. Tech can not locate color clips but has colored bridles he can add to cables for now.

Advised tech we need Fortigate online so we can begin checks.
posts.author: Roger Hicks

posts.content: Tech says Fortigate is online but I am unable to see it. Asking tech to send photos of the rack.
posts.author: Roger Hicks

posts.content: Cabling appears to be correct. Having tech check the FEXT and send a photo to see if we are plugged in to the wrong port.
posts.author: Roger Hicks

posts.content:
Verified with photo that FEXT cable is plugged into LAN1.

Still can not reach Fortigate on Primary or backup.
posts.author: Roger Hicks

posts.content: Had tech verify the Rackmount patch cables were in the correct positions per Jimmy's request. Rebooted the FEXT.
posts.author: Roger Hicks

posts.content: Fortigate is now up. All devices verified in ARP table except APs. Asking tech to verify if APs are connected.
posts.author: Roger Hicks

posts.content: AP1 now online. Tech can't locate cable for AP2. He is searching.
posts.author: Roger Hicks

posts.content: Tech is working on cable management and closeout photos.
posts.author: Roger Hicks

posts.content: Tech is sending closeout pics. Many jacks on PP are wrong color and a large number of cable clips missing. Double checking with tech to see if he found any cable clips or extra jacks we can use to remedy.
posts.author: Roger Hicks

posts.content: Site needs 2 black jacks, 2 orange jacks. Having tech correct some color clips.
posts.author: Roger Hicks

posts.content: Tech is sending final photos
posts.author: Roger Hicks

posts.content: All devices online except OCD. MOD says it frequently gets stuck booting and she called in a ticket to the Flynn HD for it. Requesting release.
posts.author: Roger Hicks

posts.content:
Update: MOD reported an issue with DT timer on tech's way out the door. Staying to resolve. Rebooted, stuck on loading screen. Called Flynn HD, opened ticket INC2142140

Tech released 06:35 AM
posts.author: Roger Hicks

posts.content:
In: 08:30 PM
Out: 06:35 AM

Brief notes on Turnup start to finish: 
FST arrived on time. Mounted APs and took inventory while waiting on store to close. Removed legacy equipment and racked new equipment. Turned up Fortigate and verified all devices were online. All devices came up except OCD, MOD reported it to Flynn HD. Also had issue with DT HME cloud, opened Flynn HD ticket for that as well.

Brief notes on significant sources of delay: 1 hour waiting on store to close

List of any Materials Used by FST: none

Approximate time and description of client driven time spent on out of scope work: none

Unresolved Issues this installation:
1. needs 2 orange and 2 black jacks, plus a full pack of cable clips for each color.
posts.author: Roger Hicks
